name: Khatori
description: Spicy and crunchy wheat snacks shaped like tiny hats. A perfect treat for a quick snack.

name: Aam Pachan
description: Tangy and spicy mango flavored candies. Reminisce the childhood memories with every bite.

name: Peppy
description: Cheese flavored balls that melt in your mouth. A favorite among kids and adults alike.

name: Rola Cola
description: Cola flavored candy that gives you the refreshing taste of cola with every chew.

name: Phantom Sweet Cigarettes
description: Sugar sticks shaped like cigarettes. A fun treat that brings back the nostalgia of the good old days.
